panels.description: The number of authentication events raised by all instances during the dashboard time.
panels.title: Authentications

panels.description: The number of SSO events raised by all instances during the dashboard time.
panels.title: SSO

panels.description: The number of all oauth tokens issued by all instances during the dashboard time.
panels.title: Tokens Issued

panels.description: The number of Introspections denied because of tokens not being active, by all instances during the dashboard time.
panels.title: Introspections denied

panels.description: Indicates if all the instances are up and running
panels.title: Status

panels.description: Indicates if any of the instances logged an error.
panels.title: Error

panels.description: Indicates if there were any debug or trace logs detected on any of the instances in an interval of 5 minutes. As a result it will take at a minimum 5 minutes after you disabled the logs until this flag changes.
panels.title: Debug

panels.description: Indicates if the server is up and running
panels.title: Status

panels.description: Indicates if there were any error logs detected. Reset the metrics if the error was resolved.
panels.title: Error

panels.description: Indicates if there were any debug or trace logs detected on this instance in an interval of 5 minutes. As a result it will take at a minimum 5 minutes after you disabled the logs until this flag changes.
panels.title: Debug

panels.description: Last reported CPU usage in percent
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Last reported total memory usage in MiB
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Shows the number of log entries by their type
panels.title: Logs

panels.description: Shows the CPU usage in percent
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Shows the memory usage in mb
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Shows the average time in seconds that it takes to process an HTTP request. This includes requests to admin and runtime nodes.
panels.title: HTTP Timing

panels.description: Shows the average time in seconds that it takes to process datasource queries. Grouped by datasource type and instance.
panels.title: DAP Timing

panels.description: Shows the average increase of SSO events per second. Grouped by authentication method and instance.
panels.title: SSO Rate

panels.description: Shows the average increase of login events per second. Grouped by authentication method and instance.
panels.title: Login Rate

panels.description: Shows the average increase of issued tokens per second. Grouped by token type and instance.
panels.title: Issued Token Rate

panels.description: Shows the average increase of revoked tokens per second. Group by token type and instance.
panels.title: Revoked Token Rate

panels.description: Shows the absolute number of logins for an authenticator and instance during the given interval
panels.title: Login Count
